carousel.heading: Code Anywhere
carousel.description: Our online code editor powered by VSCode Online allows you to work on your projects anywhere.
carousel.extendedDescription: Hosted on scalable AWS Servers means you can compile and computer faster than even your local machine.

carousel.heading: Visualize Your Projects
carousel.description: Dive into code analysis with ease using our React powered 3D Forced Graph Analysis
carousel.extendedDescription: Every file including external libraries are represented as nodes clustered in groups following the project heirarchy

carousel.heading: Deep Bug Search
carousel.description: With the click of a button, analyse your entire project for compile and runtime errors
carousel.extendedDescription: as well as highlight potential points of failure within indvidual files
